QuestData.Title: Estate Jewelry: Haute Claw-ture
QuestData.Description: An amateur merchant looks back on their previous work as a learning experience. A master knows that some things are better left forgotten.$b$bI was... vain, centuries ago. Desperate to prove myself, I took on a bold commission.$b$bFind him and bring... it... back. You will know what I am talking about when you see it.$b$bHe resides near the villa south of this courtyard.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Find and retrieve Lespin's 'art' from Mornath.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find and retrieve Lespin's 'art' from Mornath.
QuestData.CompletionText: He was so passionate, so driven. I saw his vision, created it to his exact specifications. Beautiful filigree and enamel put to a fearsome weapon...
QuestData.RewardText: By the Magistrix, I had forgotten how ugly that thing is. Impeccable workmanship, obviously. Just... ugh. I should melt the whole thing down.
